entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening and ending before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
